context.goal: Stand up automated drift detection and registry refreshers so orchestrator stays healthy.

instructions: Compare data/taskpackets/<idea> against docs/reports/ideas/<idea>/plan.md and emit a markdown diff report.
Highlight missing slices or task packets, include confidence scoring per mismatch.
Return the updated script using <FILE> fences.
acceptance_criteria: npm run maintenance:drift-check exits 0 on aligned plans
Diff report renders key sections (slices, tasks, deliverables)
Unit tests cover aligned + drift scenarios
notes: Carry out the task in your CLI/IDE environment (Codex, Roo, Kilo, etc.).
Commit work in the slice branch or attach a diff in your completion response.
